Text: Modernized Pulp MillWhalley I am emailing you this memo after reading an article posted by Enron Internal Communications I live in Cloquet Mn and have been employed by Northern Natural Gas for years The major employer in town is Potlatch Corp a paper and pulp mill The Potlatch Corporation has fallen on difficult financial times There is rumor that Stora Enso of Finland is looking at buying the pulp mill This mill has recently gone through a Bil modernization Included in the project is a steamelectric cogen facility not sure of capacity In talking to the locals the largest asset of Potlatch is their ownership of thousands of acres of forest land that should insure raw material for the future I apologize if this has wasted your time but thought that it was worth mentioning Please call if there are any questions Steve Dahnke Team Leader
